faqs.question: What platforms can you develop games for?
faqs.answer: We develop games for multiple platforms including mobile (iOS and Android), PC (Windows, Mac, Linux), web browsers, and consoles. Our cross-platform approach ensures your game reaches the widest possible audience.

faqs.question: How long does it take to develop a video game?
faqs.answer: Development timelines vary significantly based on the scope and complexity of the game. Simple mobile games might take 3-6 months, while more complex titles can take 12-24 months or more. We'll provide a detailed timeline during the planning phase.

faqs.question: What game engines do you use?
faqs.answer: We primarily work with Unity and Unreal Engine, two of the most powerful and versatile game engines available. For certain projects, we also use Godot or custom-built engines depending on the specific requirements.

faqs.question: Can you help with publishing my game?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer end-to-end support including publishing assistance. We can help with store submissions (App Store, Google Play, Steam, etc.), marketing materials, and launch strategies to ensure your game gets the attention it deserves.

faqs.question: Do you create games with AR/VR capabilities?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We have expertise in developing augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) games and experiences. We work with technologies like ARKit, ARCore, and various VR platforms to create immersive experiences.
